document.full_text: travelers in the western united states should not rely solely on technology such as gps for navigation, authorities said, after a canadian couple got lost in the vast nevada wilderness recently for 48 days.
document.title: do not rely solely on gps for western u.s. travel: experts
lines_and_colors: travelers in the western united states should not rely solely on technology such as gps for navigation, authorities said, after a canadian couple got lost in the vast nevada wilderness recently for 48 days.
